summary: Add a Standalone follower inspired by Lore of Molag Grunda
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][center][font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]Molag Grunda Standalone Follower[/size][/font][font=Comic Sans MS]

Add a Standalone follower inspired by Lore of Molag Grunda

[size=4]Big thank you for S.Silin (Ikari) for the video of the mods review:[/size]

[youtube]WUBwz6eH0rI[/youtube]

Name: Molag Grunda
Race: Nord Dremora
Body: UNP
Voiced: Female Dark elf
Essensial: False
Marrigable: True

Class: Warior 1H
Stats: Levels 50 - 150
Extra: 1000 Health, Stamina, Magica
Combat Style: Spellsword

Outfit: Grunda Vampire Outfit
Inventory: Molag Grunda Armor
Stats: Ebony armor
Craftable: False
Upgradeable: True

Weapon: Mace of Molag Grunda
Stats: Daedric Mace
Craftable: False
Upgradeable: True

[b][b]Location:
[/b][/b]The midden at atronach forge

[b]Required :
[/b]Skyrim.esm[b]
[/b]Dawnguard.esm[b]

[/b][b][b]Installation : [/b]
[/b]NMM or copy to data folder[b]

[b]Uninstall : [/b]
[/b]Remove from NMM or Delete from data folder[b]
[/b]
